title: Adani arm completes 49% acquisition in Adani Esyasoft Smart Solutions
description: Earlier reports said that the deal aims to pave the way for the development of smart solutions such as smart metering software, load forecasting, revenue maximisation, and other efficiency-based software products and solutions for utilities, both in India and globally. The agreement between these companies will see Adani and Esyasoft Holding have 49% and 51% shareholding, respectively, in Adani Esyasoft Smart Solutions Ltd.
